Functions
wdt_main.c File Reference

Example application main source file, which configures the WDT IP and executes the CPU reset use case. On overflow of the Watchdog timer a reset will occur on the CPU. More...

#include <stdio.h>
#include <ti/csl/tistdtypes.h>
#include <ti/csl/cslr_device.h>
#include <ti/csl/csl_wdt.h>
#include <ti/csl/csl_wdtAux.h>
#include <ti/board/board.h>
#include <ti/drv/uart/UART.h>
#include <ti/drv/uart/src/UART_osal.h>
#include <ti/drv/uart/UART_stdio.h>

Functions

Int32 main ()
 

Detailed Description

Example application main source file, which configures the WDT IP and executes the CPU reset use case. On overflow of the Watchdog timer a reset will occur on the CPU.

Macro Definition Documentation

#define INITIAL_COUNT_VALUE   (0xFFFE0000u)

Counter value to be programmed.
